cinema.customer_controllers

Class CustomerHomeController

  • Object
    • CustomerHomeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initializable

    public class CustomerHomeController
extends Object
implements Initializable
    Controller class for the Customer Home page. Sets up an image carousel and embedded YouTube videos at initialization. Defines functions to scroll backwards and forwards through image carousel and to navigate to different customer pages/log out.
    Author:
    carolinesmith, daianabassi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerHomeController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void goesToQuestionnaire()
      Loads the customer questionnaire page when 'win a free ticket' button clicked.
      void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed.
      void loadVideo(String content, VBox vbox)
      Loads the embedded YouTube video to a WebView and adds this WebView a VBox.
      void scrollsBack()
      Iterates backwards through the list of images for films with showings in the future.
      void scrollsForward()
      Iterates forwards through the list of images for films with showings in the future.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerHomeController

        public CustomerHomeController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URL location,
                       ResourceBundle resources)
        Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. Parses 'film.xml' file for film date information for setting up the carousel. Loads embedded youtube videos to the home page.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface Initializable

      • scrollsForward

        public void scrollsForward()
        Iterates forwards through the list of images for films with showings in the future. Gets the next image in the list and replaces the current carousel image with it.

      • scrollsBack

        public void scrollsBack()
        Iterates backwards through the list of images for films with showings in the future. Gets the next image in the list and replaces the current carousel image with it.

      • loadVideo

        public void loadVideo(String content,
                      VBox vbox)
        Loads the embedded YouTube video to a WebView and adds this WebView a VBox.
        Parameters:
        content - String URL of the embedded YouTube video.
        vbox - VBox to set the video to.

      • goesToQuestionnaire

        public void goesToQuestionnaire()
        Loads the customer questionnaire page when 'win a free ticket' button clicked. Calls goToNextPage function from cinema.CinemaMain
        Parameters:
        event - the button click event
